summary: Aksuat is the name of a village in Kazakhstan, where Kanat takes his pregnant wife Zhanna to visit his brother, Aman. Just after the baby is born, Kanat is thrown into jail after a fight ... See full summary Â»
cast: Erzhan Ashim|Nurzhuman Ikhtymbaev|Sabit Kurmanbekov|Erbolat Ospankulov|Inessa Radionova
title: Aksuat
